Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface

public interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit Customer DAO (Data Access Object). This interface defines methods for customer-related operations such as registering customers, viewing available gyms and slots, booking gym slots, and checking bookings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    bookGymSlot(int customerId, int slotId)
    Books a gym slot for a customer.

    Retrieves the list of available slots for a given gym.

    List<FlipFitBooking>

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      void registerCustomer(FlipFitCustomer customer) throws SQLException
      Registers a new customer in the system.
      Parameters:
      customer - The FlipFitCustomer object containing customer details.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • viewGymList

      List<FlipFitGymCentre> viewGymList() throws SQLException
      Retrieves the list of all gym centers available for customers.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitGymCentre objects representing the gym centers.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • viewAvailableSlots

      List<FlipFitSlot> viewAvailableSlots(int gymId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the list of available slots for a given gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique identifier of the gym.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitSlot objects representing available slots.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • bookGymSlot

      String bookGymSlot(int customerId, int slotId) throws SQLException
      Books a gym slot for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique identifier of the customer.
      slotId - The unique identifier of the slot to be booked.
      Returns:
      A confirmation message indicating success or failure.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • viewMyBookings

      List<FlipFitBooking> viewMyBookings(int customerId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the list of bookings made by a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique identifier of the customer.
      Returns:
      A list of FlipFitBooking objects representing the customer's bookings.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
